item.title: schoolhatry
item.description: Little Ys : I dont like school,because it’s hot and dry plus nobody likes me.

education background 2020.9-pre: undergraduate, major in statistics, School of Management, University of Science and Technology 2017.9-2020.7: Senior High School, Dongguan Middle School Selected Courses Probability and Statistics Analysis and Differential Equations Algebra CS Probability Theory(98) Mathematical Analysis $B_1-B_3$ (95,95,96) Linear Algebra $B_1 - B_2$ (100,94) C programing(95) Applied Stochastic Processes(96) Real Analysis (99) Data Structure and Database(99) Mathematical Statistics() Complex Analysis () Applied Statistics Software(95)
